actions.name: AreaOnAreaOverlayer
actions.description: Overlays an area on another area

actions.name: AttributeBulkArrayJoiner
actions.description: Join Array Attributes Into Single Values

actions.name: AttributeConversionTable
actions.description: Transform Feature Attributes Using Lookup Tables

actions.name: AttributeFilePathInfoExtractor
actions.description: Extracts file path information from attributes

actions.name: BulkAttributeRenamer
actions.description: Renames attributes by adding/removing prefixes or suffixes, or replacing text

actions.name: CenterPointReplacer
actions.description: Replaces the geometry of the feature with a point that is either in the center of the feature's bounding box, at the center of mass of the feature, or somewhere guaranteed to be inside the feature's area.

actions.name: CityGmlWriter
actions.description: Writes features to CityGML 2.0 files with PLATEAU extension support

actions.name: Clipper
actions.description: Divides Candidate features using Clipper features, so that Candidates and parts of Candidates that are inside or outside of the Clipper features are output separately

actions.name: ClosedCurveFilter
actions.description: Checks if curves form closed loops

actions.name: CoordinateSystemSetter
actions.description: Sets the coordinate system of a feature

actions.name: CsvReader
actions.description: Reads features from a CSV file

actions.name: CzmlReader
actions.description: Reads geographic features from CZML (Cesium Language) files for 3D visualization

actions.name: CzmlWriter
actions.description: Writes features to a CZML file

actions.name: Dissolver
actions.description: Dissolve adjacent polygons with common attributes

actions.name: ElevationExtractor
actions.description: Extracts a featureâ€™s first z coordinate value, storing it in an attribute.

actions.name: Extruder
actions.description: Extrudes a polygon by a distance

actions.name: FeatureLodFilter
actions.description: Filter based on Level of Detail

actions.name: FilePathExtractor
actions.description: Extracts files from a directory or an archive

actions.name: GeoJsonReader
actions.description: Reads features from a GeoJSON file

actions.name: GeoJsonWriter
actions.description: Writes features to a geojson file

actions.name: GeometryCoercer
actions.description: Coerces the geometry of a feature to a specific geometry

actions.name: GeometryExtractor
actions.description: Extracts geometry from a feature and adds it as an attribute.

actions.name: GeometryReplacer
actions.description: Replaces the geometry of a feature with a new geometry.

actions.name: GeometryValidator
actions.description: Validates the geometry of a feature

actions.name: HoleCounter
actions.description: Counts the number of holes in a geometry and adds it as an attribute.

actions.name: HoleExtractor
actions.description: Extracts holes in a geometry and adds it as an attribute.

actions.name: HorizontalReprojector
actions.description: Reprojects the geometry of a feature to a specified coordinate system

actions.name: InputRouter
actions.description: Action for first port forwarding for sub-workflows.

actions.name: JPStandardGridAccumulator
actions.description: Accumulates features on Japanese standard grid

actions.name: LineOnLineOverlayer
actions.description: Intersection points are turned into point features that can contain the merged list of attributes of the original intersected lines.

actions.name: Offsetter
actions.description: Adds offsets to the feature's coordinates.

actions.name: OrientationExtractor
actions.description: Extracts the orientation of a geometry from a feature and adds it as an attribute.

actions.name: OutputRouter
actions.description: Action for last port forwarding for sub-workflows.

actions.name: PLATEAU3.BuildingUsageAttributeValidator
actions.description: This processor validates building usage attributes by checking for the presence of required attributes and ensuring the correctness of city codes. It outputs errors through the lBldgError and codeError ports if any issues are found.

actions.name: PLATEAU3.DomainOfDefinitionValidator
actions.description: Validates domain of definition of CityGML features

actions.name: PLATEAU3.UDXFolderExtractor
actions.description: Extracts UDX folders from cityGML path

actions.name: PLATEAU3.XMLAttributeExtractor
actions.description: Extracts attributes from XML fragments based on a schema definition

actions.name: PLATEAU4.CityCodeExtractor
actions.description: Extracts city code from PLATEAU4 data

actions.name: PLATEAU4.DomainOfDefinitionValidator
actions.description: Validates domain of definition for PLATEAU4

actions.name: PLATEAU4.MaxLodExtractor
actions.description: Extracts maximum Level of Detail for PLATEAU4

actions.name: PLATEAU4.MissingAttributeDetector
actions.description: Detects missing attributes in PLATEAU4 data

actions.name: PLATEAU4.ObjectListExtractor
actions.description: Extracts object lists from PLATEAU4 data

actions.name: PLATEAU4.UDXFolderExtractor
actions.description: Extracts UDX folders from PLATEAU4 data

actions.name: ThreeDimensionBoxReplacer
actions.description: Replaces a three Dimension box with a polygon.

actions.name: ThreeDimensionRotator
actions.description: Replaces a three Dimension box with a polygon.

actions.name: TwoDimensionForcer
actions.description: Forces a geometry to be two dimensional.

actions.name: ThreeDimensionForcer
actions.description: Converts 2D geometries to 3D by adding Z-coordinates (elevation)

actions.name: VertexRemover
actions.description: Removes specific vertices from a feature's geometry

actions.name: VerticalReprojector
actions.description: Reprojects the geometry of a feature to a specified coordinate system

actions.name: WasmRuntimeExecutor
actions.description: Compiles scripts into .wasm and runs at the wasm runtime

actions.name: ZipFileWriter
actions.description: Writes features to a zip file
